name: JobJarChores
0:
”Alexa, Open Job Jar”
”Open Job Jar”
”Alexa, Start Job Jar”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: job jar
des: The purpose of this skill is to suggest a chore that might need doing when someone needs something to do. It's like drawing into a mason jar of your favorite activities and always pulling out some gem of a way to spend your time.
